{{NPC infobox |game = poe2 |name = Jacob Harker |image = Portrait Jacob Harker Convo.png |image2 = PE2 Jacob Harker.png |caption = |race = Human |subrace = Meadow |gender = Male |culture = [Príncipi sen Patrena](/principiSenPatrena/) |background = |faction = |deity = |personality = Roguish |class = Rogue |level = 12 |MIG = 14 |CON = 15 |DEX = 15 |PER = 13 |INT = 14 |RES = 14 |location = [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/) |quests = [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/)
[Iron Gut](/ironGut/) |sells = Food, drink, and rooms |resting = yes |adventurers = yes |companion = |loot = Equipped gear
[Dunnage Tavern Owner Key](/dunnageTavernOwnerKey/) |body = Príncipi Clothing |weapon1 = Exceptional Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Pistol |weapon1_offhand = Exceptional Pistol (Deadfire){{!}}Exceptional Pistol |internalname = CHA_17_DUN_Tavern_Owner |guid = bda6b8e1-95fd-47c3-915d-6d2456820497 }} '''Jacob Harker''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|At the bar, you find a tall man with salt gray hair and strikingly bright blue eyes. His face sports a handful of long scars that continue down his neck and disappear beneath the collar of his shirt. He looks up from wiping down the counter when you approach and gives you a broad, disarming smile.}} Jacob Harker is the innkeeper of [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/) on [Dunnage](/dunnage/). In a previous life, he was the infamous Red King, bane of Vailian merchants on the high seas, exacting his revenge for the Republics driving his father out of business. After a while, however, he tired of the pirate hunters, so he paid off his crew, beached the dhow at Dunnage, and started a tavern. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Food, drink, rooms and supplies. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Iron Gut](/ironGut/)
[A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/) |none = |other = }} ## =Rooms = * Jacob rents rooms. The available options are: ** The Bilge Pump (free) ** Sailors' Berth ({{cp2|200}}): +10% Max Health, +1 enemies engaged ** Officers' Quarters ({{cp2|400}}): +2 [Might](/might/) and [Concentration](/concentration/) ** Captain's Cabin ({{cp2|800}}): +3 [Perception](/perception/), +1 max empower points ## =Quests = * [Iron Gut](/ironGut/): Jacob Harker will sell a vial of [Fire Kelp Extract](/fireKelpExtract/), an ingredient for Ondra's Bile, required for the [Iron Gut](/ironGut/) task. * [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/): He will sell you the freedom of [Taerna](/taerna/), required for the [A Tidy Performance](/aTidyPerformance/) task. ## Behind the scenes * The character portrait for Jacob Harker is based on [Tim Cain](/timCain/), a developer at [Obsidian Entertainment](/obsidianEntertainment/), well known for his leadership role in the creation of ''[https://fallout.gamepedia.com/Fallout Fallout]''. [Category:Dunnage characters](/categoryDunnageCharacters/)

His face sports a handful of long scars that continue down his neck and disappear beneath the collar of his shirt. He looks up from wiping down the counter when you approach and gives you a broad, disarming smile.}} Jacob Harker is the innkeeper of [[The King's Coffin]] on [[Dunnage]]. In a previous life, he was the infamous Red King, bane of Vailian merchants on the high seas, exacting his revenge for the Republics driving his father out of business. After a while, however, he tired of the pirate hunters, so he paid off his crew, beached the dhow at Dunnage, and started a tavern. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = Food, drink, rooms and supplies. |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [[Iron Gut]]
[[A Tidy Performance]] |none = |other = }} ===Rooms=== * Jacob rents rooms. The available options are: ** The Bilge Pump (free) ** Sailors' Berth ({{cp2|200}}): +10% Max Health, +1 enemies engaged ** Officers' Quarters ({{cp2|400}}): +2 [[Might]] and [[Concentration]] ** Captain's Cabin ({{cp2|800}}): +3 [[Perception]], +1 max empower points ===Quests=== * [[Iron Gut]]: Jacob Harker will sell a vial of [[Fire Kelp Extract]], an ingredient for Ondra's Bile, required for the [[Iron Gut]] task. * [[A Tidy Performance]]: He will sell you the freedom of [[Taerna]], required for the [[A Tidy Performance]] task. == Behind the scenes == * The character portrait for Jacob Harker is based on [[Tim Cain]], a developer at [[Obsidian Entertainment]], well known for his leadership role in the creation of ''[https://fallout.gamepedia.com/Fallout Fallout]''.
